title: TOC DFA
html:
Q1.Give an algorithm to tell whether a regular language L is infinite

A - let there be n states then if it accepts some string n with length > n then there is a cycle which means it is infinite.



Q2.Give an algorithm to tell whether a regular language L contains at least 100 strings

A - if it is infinite then it is direct,

     else if it is finite  then it can only accept string with length <= n 

     in this case so check all strings with length < = n then count them. 




Q3.Give an algorithm to tell whether two regular languages L1 and L2 have at least one string in common

A - let L3 = L1 intersect L2 ,then if there is path from start to end then they have string in common
